transform_def.name: designed27
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = sin((p_in.x + p_in.y) * (p_in.x - p_in.y) / twopi()) t = cos(p_in.x * p_in.y / pi()) u = tan(length(p_in * s * t)) * r z = (if r < twoinvpi() then u else p_in.y + sign(p_in.x)) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
